message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to part with it for a price of $1500000. This is a great deal, considering its value to me is no less than $1200000. What do you think?

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the price of $1500000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1200000. I hope this aligns better with your valuation of the item.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still a bit above your offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway and propose a counteroffer of $1350000. This is a compromise that I believe is fair, considering the product's value to me. What do you think?

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the gesture, I must respectfully decline at $1350000. I am still seeking a price closer to my maximum budget of $800000. I am willing to increase my counteroffer to $1300000 if that helps us move closer to an agreement.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget. However, I'm still not comfortable selling at $1300000. I'm willing to make one more concession and propose a counteroffer of $1310000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the product's value to me. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further, Alice. However, I'm still not able to meet your latest offer of $1310000. Given my budget constraints, I am unable to exceed $800000. I am sorry for not being able to reach an agreement on this occasion.
